DataElement.preferredName: Study Participant Prior AIDS Malignancy Consortium Clinical Trial Enrollment Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Response indicating whether study participant has previously enrolled in an AIDS Malignancy Consortium clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Study Participant Prior AIDS Malignancy Consortium Clinical Trial Enrollment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any individiual that has a role in a study, including study personnel and study subjects.:Earlier in time or order._Established in 1995 to carry out Phase I and II studies of innovative therapies for AIDS malignancies._A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes._The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled.

Property.preferredName: Prior AIDS Malignancy Consortium Clinical Trial Enrollment
Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order._Established in 1995 to carry out Phase I and II studies of innovative therapies for AIDS malignancies._A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes._The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled.

Concepts.definition: Established in 1995 to carry out Phase I and II studies of innovative therapies for AIDS malignancies.
A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.
The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled.
